description.en:
Same Finance is a leveraged yield farming protocol, with a focus on stablecoin yield farming for more stable yields. SameFinance's easy deposits and intuitive UX also aims at making yield farming more accessible. SameFinance offers up to 11x funds for liquidity providing miners obtain excess mining profits.
Same Finance cleverly links both borrowers and lenders through a series of complex contract mechanisms to continuously improve the overall capital utilization rate of the DeFi market. While bringing a higher rate of return, it also maximizes the safety of user funds.
